description.left: Indicate presence of any hereditary genetic disorders. (Reference: Genetic disorder names were standardized using Orphanet (https://www.orpha.net/) and NCI Thesaurus)
description.right: Indicate presence of any hereditary genetic disorders. Genetic diseases are diseases in which inherited genes predispose to increased risk. The genetic disorders associated with cancer often result from an alteration or mutation in a single gene. The diseases range from rare dominant cancer family syndrome to familial tendencies in which low-penetrance genes may interact with other genes or environmental factors to induce cancer. (References: NCIt C3101. Genetic disorder names were standardized using Orphanet (https://www.orpha.net/) and NCI Thesaurus)

lost_to_followup_after_clinical_event_id.description: If the donor became lost to follow up, indicate the identifier of the clinical event (eg. submitter_primary_diagnosis_id, submitter_treatment_id or submitter_follow_up_id) after which the donor became lost to follow up.

meta.displayName: Lost To Follow Up After Clinical Event

country_of_residence_at_enrollment.description: Indicate the donor's country of residence at the time they were enrolled in the study. The country list include 193 UN member states plus 2 UN observer states. Source: https://www.un.org/en/about-us/member-states
country_of_residence_at_enrollment.name: country_of_residence_at_enrollment

codeList: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description.right: For cancer in a paired organ, indicate the side on which the specimen was obtained. (Reference caDSR CDE ID 2007875)

left: Cryopreservation of live cells in liquid nitrogen
right: Cryopreservation of live cells in liquid nitrogen

description.left: Indicate whether the pathological diagnosis was confirmed by a (central) reference pathologist.
description.right: Indicate whether the pathological diagnosis was confirmed by a (central) reference pathologist. (Reference caDSR CDE ID 2007007)

percent_tumour_cells_measurement_method.name: percent_tumour_cells_measurement_method
percent_tumour_cells_measurement_method.description: Indicate method used to measure percent_tumour_cells.

meta.notes: This field is only required if the specimen is a tumour.

description.left: For cancer in a paired organ, indicate the side of the body on which the primary tumour or cancer first developed at the time of primary diagnosis. (Reference caDSR 827)

notes.left:
This field uses standardized vocabulary from the RxNorm database (https://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm), provided by the NIH.

You can search for RX Norm values through the web interface (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/) or API (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/download/rxnav/RxNormAPIs.html).

For example, to find the rxnormcui based on drug name, you can use: https://rxnav.nlm.nih.gov/REST/rxcui.json?name=leucovorin or https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/search?searchBy=String&searchTerm=leucovorin
notes.right:
This field uses standardized vocabulary from the RxNorm database (https://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm), provided by the NIH.

You can search for RX Norm values through the web interface (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/) or API (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/download/rxnav/RxNormAPIs.html).

For example, to find the rxnormcui based on drug name, you can use: https://rxnav.nlm.nih.gov/REST/rxcui.json?name=leucovorin or https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/search?searchBy=String&searchTerm=leucovorin. 

If the drugs don't exist in RxNorm, please indicate drug_database, drug_id and drug_term where the drugs information can be found.

If the drugs don't exist in RxNorm, please indicate drug_database, drug_id and drug_term where the drugs information can be found.

drug_database.name: drug_database
drug_database.description: Indicate the drug database where drug term is found.

meta.notes: If the drugs don't exist in RxNorm, please indicate drug_database, drug_id and drug_term where the drugs information can be found.

drug_id.name: drug_id
drug_id.description: Indicate the identifier from the drug_database for the drug.

meta.notes: If the drugs don't exist in RxNorm, please indicate drug_database, drug_id and drug_term where the drugs information can be found.

drug_term.name: drug_term
drug_term.description: Indicate the drug term as it exists in the database specified in the drug_database.

meta.notes: If the drugs don't exist in RxNorm, please indicate drug_database, drug_id and drug_term where the drugs information can be found.

chemotherapy_drug_dose_units.name: chemotherapy_drug_dose_units
chemotherapy_drug_dose_units.description: Indicate units used to record chemotherapy drug dose.

prescribed_cumulative_drug_dose.name: prescribed_cumulative_drug_dose
prescribed_cumulative_drug_dose.description: Indicate the total prescribed cumulative drug dose in the same units specified in chemotherapy_drug_dose_units.

meta.notes: Either the 'actual_cumulative_drug_dose' or the 'prescribed_cumulative_drug_dose' field must be submitted.

actual_cumulative_drug_dose.name: actual_cumulative_drug_dose
actual_cumulative_drug_dose.description: Indicate the total actual cumulative drug dose in the same units specified in chemotherapy_drug_dose_units.

meta.notes: Either the 'actual_cumulative_drug_dose' or the 'prescribed_cumulative_drug_dose' field must be submitted.

chemotherapy_dosage_units.name: chemotherapy_dosage_units
chemotherapy_dosage_units.description: Indicate units used to record chemotherapy drug dosage.

cumulative_drug_dosage.name: cumulative_drug_dosage
cumulative_drug_dosage.description: Indicate the total actual drug dose in the same units specified in chemotherapy_dosage_units.

radiation_boost.name: radiation_boost
radiation_boost.description: A radiation boost is an extra radiation treatment targeted at the tumor bed, given after the regular sessions of radiation is complete (Reference NCIt: C137812). Indicate if this radiation treatment was a radiation boost.

reference_radiation_treatment_id.name: reference_radiation_treatment_id
reference_radiation_treatment_id.description: If a radiation boost was given, indicate the 'submitter_treatment_id' of the primary radiation treatment the radiation boost treatment is linked to.

description.left: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code for the anatomic site where disease progression, relapse or recurrence occurred, according to the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (WHO ICD-O-3). Refer to the ICD-O-3 manual for guidelines at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344.
description.right: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code for the anatomic site(s) where disease progression, relapse or recurrence occurred, according to the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (WHO ICD-O-3). Refer to the ICD-O-3 manual for guidelines at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344.

notes.left: This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.
notes.right:
This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.
To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

left: Current reformed smoker, duration not specified
Lifelong non-smoker (<100 cigarettes smoked in lifetime)
right: Current reformed smoker, duration not specified
Lifelong non-smoker (<100 cigarettes smoked in lifetime)

left: Social Drinker (> once a month, < once a week)
right: Social Drinker (> once a month, < once a week)

left: Most days but not every day
right: Most days but not every day

left: Most days but not every day
right: Most days but not every day

left: Most days but not every day
right: Most days but not every day

left: Most days but not every day
right: Most days but not every day

left: Low: No increase in the heart beat, and no perspiration
Moderate: Increase in the heart beat slightly with some light perspiration
Vigorous: Increase in the heart beat substantially with heavy perspiration
right: Low: No increase in the heart beat, and no perspiration
Moderate: Increase in the heart beat slightly with some light perspiration
Vigorous: Increase in the heart beat substantially with heavy perspiration

program_id.name: program_id
program_id.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

submitter_donor_id.name: submitter_donor_id
submitter_donor_id.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

submitter_specimen_id.name: submitter_specimen_id
submitter_specimen_id.description: If a specimen was resected during surgery, indicate the unique identifier of the specimen here. This submitter_specimen_id should exist in the Specimen file.

meta.notes: Please refer to documentation for instructions on how to submit a specimen that was resected during surgery: https://docs.icgc-argo.org/docs/submission/submitting-clinical-data#submitting-data-in-surgery-file

submitter_treatment_id.name: submitter_treatment_id
submitter_treatment_id.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, assigned by the data provider.

surgery_type.name: surgery_type
surgery_type.description: Indicate the type of surgical procedure that was performed. (References: SNOMED, NCIt, UMLS)

codeList: Debridement of pancreatic and peripancreatic necrosis

surgery_site.name: surgery_site
surgery_site.description: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code for the anatomic site where the surgical procedure was performed, according to the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (WHO ICD-O-3).

meta.notes: Refer to the ICD-O-3 manual for guidelines at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344. This field is not required if a specimen was resected during surgery (ie. if `submitter_specimen_id` is submitted) since anatomic site is collected in the Specimen table.

surgery_location.name: surgery_location
surgery_location.description: Indicate whether the surgical procedure was done at the primary, local recurrence or metastatic location.

meta.notes: This field is not required if a specimen was resected during surgery (ie. if `submitter_specimen_id` is submitted) since type of specimen is collected in the Specimen table.

tumour_length.name: tumour_length
tumour_length.description: Indicate the length of the tumour, in millimetres (mm).

tumour_width.name: tumour_width
tumour_width.description: Indicate the width of the tumour, in millimetres (mm).

greatest_dimension_tumour.name: greatest_dimension_tumour
greatest_dimension_tumour.description: Indicate the greatest dimension or diameter of the tumour, in millimetres (mm). (Reference: NCIt C157135)

tumour_focality.name: tumour_focality
tumour_focality.description: Indicate the characterization of the location of the tumour. (Reference: NCIt: C157425)

residual_tumour_classification.name: residual_tumour_classification
residual_tumour_classification.description: Indicate the absence or presence of residual tumour after treatment. In some cases treated with surgery and/or with neoadjuvant therapy there will be residual tumour at the primary site after treatment because of incomplete resection or local and regional disease that extends beyond the limit of ability of resection. (Reference: AJCC 8th ed.)

meta.notes: RX (Presence of residual tumour cannot be assessed), R0 (no residual tumour), R1 (microscopic residual tumour), R2 (macroscopic residual tumour)
To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

margin_types_not_involved.name: margin_types_not_involved
margin_types_not_involved.description: Indicate the margin type(s) not involved.

meta.notes: To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

margin_types_not_assessed.name: margin_types_not_assessed
margin_types_not_assessed.description: Indicate the margin type(s) that cannot be assessed.

meta.notes: To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

lymphovascular_invasion.name: lymphovascular_invasion
lymphovascular_invasion.description: Indicate the absence or presence of lymphovascular invasion (LVI). LVI includes lymphatic invasion, vascular invasion and lymphovascular invasion. (Reference: AJCC 8th ed.)

codeList: Both lymphatic and small vessel and venous (large vessel) invasion
Lymphatic and small vessel invasion only

perineural_invasion.name: perineural_invasion
perineural_invasion.description: A morphologic finding referring to a tumour that has spread along and infiltrated nerve fibers. Indicate the presence or absence of perineural invasion. (Reference: NCIt: C48260, ICCR)

extrathyroidal_extension.name: extrathyroidal_extension
extrathyroidal_extension.description: Indicate the involvement of perithyroidal soft tissues by direct extension from the thyroid primary. (Reference: AJCC 8th Ed.)
